page.title: 10SCHOOLNG
page.content: In our area block there is only one school that is South Hykeham primary school.In the school there are only 56 children altogether.There are three teachers and three classrooms so a teacher to a class. There are three female teachers at the school. Three quarters of the pupils live in North Hykeham. Most of them go there because their familys were taught there. The children go to school by a variety of ways.Some go by car,some walk and some use bicycles. The school was once owned by the church but it is now owned by the County Council.An extension has been added to the original school room. Because there a so few children at the school they do not take part in any football or netball leagues or competitions, although they do have netball and football pitches.
